reporter_caption.center: FISICHELLA v. VANDERCASTEELE, 32 Mass. App. Ct. 1109 (1992)

caption.center: ANGELO FISICHELLA vs. STEPHEN J. VANDERCASTEELE another.

opinion.opinion_text: The judgments entered on April 29, 1991, are affirmed. The defendants' appeal from the order entered on July 23, 1991, is dismissed as moot.
